thread.title: Christina Hendricks Rocks Deep Red Corseted Silk Ensemble on Date Night With Fiancé
thread.title_full: Christina Hendricks Rocks Deep Red Corseted Silk Ensemble on Date Night With Fiancé

author: NewsBreak Original
title: Christina Hendricks Rocks Deep Red Corseted Silk Ensemble on Date Night With Fiancé
text: Christina Hendricks and her fiancé, George Bianchini , dressed to the nines as they made an industry gala event the perfect date night. The two arrived at The Art Of Elysium's 2024 HEAVEN Gala in Los Angeles on Saturday, Jan. 6, in stunning complimentary looks. While Bianchini went for a classic black tuxedo with a sleek bowtie and tiny dot detailing, Hendricks flaunted her figure in all red. The Buccaneers actress might've taken inspiration from her show's costume department, as she wore a deep red silk corseted top with mid-length sleeves and a long matching silk skirt. With her bright red hair the perfect accessory to the look, Hendricks proved once again that red is her color. Steve Granitz&solFilmMagic Also at the event were Heidi Klum and her daughter Leni , as well as Patricia Arquette , Joseph Gordon-Levitt , Jason Segel and more. Retta , who co-starred with Hendricks in the much-loved TV series, Good Girls, was also at the event. Recently, Hendricks has been sharing plenty of behind-the-scenes photos from her new show, The Buccaneers , while the first season aired. In the series, set in the 1870s, Hendricks plays Patti St. George, the mother of Nan, played by Kristine Frøseth . Throughout Season 1's episodes, Hendricks stuns in many different period costumes, and fans loved the looks. In one behind-the-scenes shot , Hendricks wore a rich blue dress with her hair up as she rested between takes with her dog. The looks often have corsets, velvet and lots of lace, and Hendricks exudes elegance while on set. Of course, this isn't her first foray into period dramas, as Hendricks previously gained acclaim for her performance as Joan Harris in the 1960s-set hit show Mad Men . Luckily for fans of Hendricks and The Buccaneers , Apple TV+ has already renewed the show for a second season, though there is no word yet on a release date. Next: No Mad Men Here! All About Christina Hendricks' Love Life and Her Soon-to-Be Husband
